# Appcat Docs

> Documentation for Appcat Docs.

*Topics available: 8*

- [Azure Migrate application and code assessment for .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/migration/appcat/app-code-assessment-toolkit.md): Learn how to assess .NET applications to evaluate their readiness to migrate to Azure.
- [How to customize analysis with JSON run configurations](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/migration/appcat/custom-configuration.md): Learn how to include a JSON file to configure your code assessment
- [Use Azure Migrate application and code assessment for .NET with the .NET CLI](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/migration/appcat/dotnet-cli.md): Learn how to assess .NET applications to evaluate their readiness to migrate to Azure with the .NET CLI.
- [Azure Migrate application and code assessment for .NET FAQ](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/migration/appcat/faq.md): Frequently asked questions for the Azure Migrate application and code assessment for .NET
- [Azure Migrate application and code assessment for .NET installation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/migration/appcat/install.md): Learn how to install Azure Migrate application and code assessment for .NET
- [Interpret the analysis results from the Azure Migrate application and code assessment for .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/migration/appcat/interpret-results.md): Learn how to interpret the results the analysis of .NET applications with the Azure Migrate application and code assessment tool.
- [Use GitHub Copilot for Visual Studio with the Azure Migrate application and code assessment for .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/migration/appcat/visual-studio-copilot.md): Learn how to use GitHub Copilot with the Azure Migrate application and code assessment tool for .NET when evaluating apps for Azure migrations.
- [Use Azure Migrate application and code assessment for .NET with Visual Studio](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/migration/appcat/visual-studio.md): Learn how to assess .NET applications to evaluate their readiness to migrate to Azure with Visual Studio.
